comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: The title is misspelled. Should be Queen Alexandra, consort of Edward VII. Photographer info: W. & D. Downey, 57 & 61 Ebury Street, [London, S.W. 1]

comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC copy of this photo, also with the name misspelled, was posted on Flickr on May 21, 2010:

comment._content:
trialsanderrors:

Thanks for catching the typo on her name. We will add her full identification when we update the record.

comment._content: Great picture; I wish more was know about this lovely lady and her history.
